## Learning with Technology

![Data visualization example Line Chart ](images/line_chart_01.png){width=80%}
![Data visualization example Bar Chart ](images/bar_chart.png){width=80%}

Data visualization allows complex numerical data to be presented in a clear and meaningful way. Through charts and graphs, patterns and trends become easier to understand compared to raw tables of numbers.
